# GCInputRightShoulder

**Global Variable**

The name of the right shoulder button.

## Declaration

```swift
var GCInputRightShoulder: String { get }
```

## Related Documentation

- **rightShoulder**: The controller’s right shoulder button element.

## Shoulder button names

- **GCInputLeftShoulder**: The name of the left shoulder button.
